Summaryinfo.ReportComments: NB: Boyum IT A/S does not perform any support on modification of this layout.

Table.Name: Command
Command
Table.Command: SELECT T0.CardCode, T0.CardName, T0.Address, T0.ZipCode, T0.City, T0.Country, T0.LangCode, T0.Currency, T0.CardType FROM OCRD T0 WHERE T0.CardCode = '{?CardCode}'

Table.Name: Command
Table.Command: SELECT ISNULL(T0.CompnyName,'') AS 'Name', ISNULL(T0.CompnyAddr,'') AS AddressFull, ISNULL(T1.Street,'') AS AddressStreet, ISNULL(T1.Block,'') AS AddressBlock, ISNULL(T1.City,'') AS AddressCity, ISNULL(T1.ZipCode,'') AS AddressZipCode, ISNULL(T1.County,'') AS AddressCounty, ISNULL(T1.State,'') AS AddressState, ISNULL(T0.Country,'') AS AddressCountry, ISNULL(T0.Phone1,'') AS Phone1, ISNULL(T0.Phone2,'') AS Phone2, ISNULL(T0.Fax,'') AS Fax, ISNULL(T0.E_Mail,'') AS Email, ISNULL(T0.Manager,'') AS Manager, ISNULL(T0.MainCurncy,'') AS LocalCurrency, ISNULL(T0.SysCurrncy,'') AS SystemCurrency, ISNULL(T0.TaxIdNum,'') AS FederalTaxId, ISNULL(T0.TaxIdNum2,'') AS FederalTaxId2, ISNULL(T0.TaxIdNum3,'') AS FederalTaxId3, ISNULL(T0.FreeZoneNo,'') AS AdditionalId, ISNULL(T0.RevOffice,'') AS TaxOffice, ISNULL(T0.CaredType,'') AS PayInFormType, ISNULL(T0.PBSNumber,'') AS PayInFormNumber, ISNULL(T0.PBSGroupNo,'') AS PayInFormGroupNumber, ISNULL(T1.IntrntAdrs,'') AS Website, ISNULL(T0.PrintHeadr,'') AS PrintHeader, ISNULL(T0.XmlPath,'') AS PathXml, ISNULL(T0.ExcelPath,'') AS PathExcel, ISNULL(T2.WordPath,'') AS PathWord, ISNULL(T2.BitmapPath,'') AS PathBitmap, ISNULL(T2.AttachPath,'') AS PathAttach, ISNULL(T2.ExtPath,'') AS PathExtension, ISNULL(T0.BankCountr,'') AS BankCountry, ISNULL(T0.DflBnkCode,'') AS BankCode, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.BankName,'') FROM ODSC TS0 WHERE TS0.CountryCod = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode) AS BankName, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.SwiftNum,'') FROM ODSC TS0 WHERE TS0.CountryCod = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode) AS BankSwift, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.IBAN,'') FROM DSC1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Country = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode AND TS0.Branch = T0.DflBranch AND TS0.Account = T0.DflBnkAcct) AS BankIban, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.Street,'') FROM DSC1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Country = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode AND TS0.Branch = T0.DflBranch AND TS0.Account = T0.DflBnkAcct) AS BankStreet, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.Block,'') FROM DSC1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Country = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode AND TS0.Branch = T0.DflBranch AND TS0.Account = T0.DflBnkAcct) AS BankBlock, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.City,'') FROM DSC1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Country = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode AND TS0.Branch = T0.DflBranch AND TS0.Account = T0.DflBnkAcct) AS BankCity, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.County,'') FROM DSC1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Country = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode AND TS0.Branch = T0.DflBranch AND TS0.Account = T0.DflBnkAcct) AS BankCounty, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.State,'') FROM DSC1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Country = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode AND TS0.Branch = T0.DflBranch AND TS0.Account = T0.DflBnkAcct) AS BankState, (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.ZipCode,'') FROM DSC1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Country = T0.BankCountr AND TS0.BankCode = T0.DflBnkCode AND TS0.Branch = T0.DflBranch AND TS0.Account = T0.DflBnkAcct) AS BankZipCode, ISNULL(T0.DflBnkAcct,'') AS BankAccount, ISNULL(T0.DflBranch,'') AS BankBranch, ISNULL(T0.HldCode,'') AS HolidayCode, ISNULL(T0.MultiLang,'') AS MultiLanguageSupport, ISNULL(T2.LogoFile,'') AS Logo FROM OADM T0 JOIN ADM1 T1 ON 1=1 JOIN OADP T2 ON 1=1

Table.Name: Command

FormulaFieldDefinitions.FormulaFieldDefinition: switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', '0-30 dage:', {@X_Language} = 'NO', '0-30 dager:', {@X_Language} = 'DE', '0-30 Tage', {@X_Language} = 'ES', '0-30 días', {@X_Language} = 'FI', '0-30 päivää', {@X_Language} = 'NL', '0-30 dagen', {@X_Language} = 'FR', '0-30 jours', True, '0-30 days:' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', '31-60 dage:', {@X_Language} = 'NO', '31-60 dager:', {@X_Language} = 'DE', '31-60 Tage', {@X_Language} = 'ES', '31-60 días', {@X_Language} = 'FI', '31-60 päivää', {@X_Language} = 'NL', '31-60 dagen', {@X_Language} = 'FR', '31-60 jours', True, '31-60 days:' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', '61+ dage:', {@X_Language} = 'NO', '61+ dager:', {@X_Language} = 'DE', '61+ Tage', {@X_Language} = 'ES', '60+ días', {@X_Language} = 'FI', '61+ päivää', {@X_Language} = 'NL', '60+ dagen', {@X_Language} = 'FR', '61+ jours', True, '61+ days:' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Kontonr.', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Kontonr:', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Kontonummer', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Número de cuenta', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Tilinumero', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Accountnr.', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Numéro de compte', True, 'Account' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Bankadresse', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Bankadresse', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Bankadresse', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Dirección de banco', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Pankkiosoite', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Bankadres', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Adresse de la banque', True, 'Bank-address' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'EU-Moms nummer', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Org.nr', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'EU Ust-ID', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'EU NIF', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'ALV-numero', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'BTW-nr', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Numéro de TVA', True, 'Federal Tax Id' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Fremtidig forfald:', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Fremtidig forfall:', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Künftiger Fälligkeit:', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Vencimiento futuro:', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Tulevaisuudessa:', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Toekomstige opdracht:', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Attributions futures:', True, 'Future Remit:' //Default English )

if({BusinessPartner.Currency} = '##') then switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Saldo '+{CompanyInfo.LocalCurrency}, {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Saldo '+{CompanyInfo.LocalCurrency}, {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Saldo '+{CompanyInfo.LocalCurrency}, {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Saldo '+{CompanyInfo.LocalCurrency}, {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Saldo '+{CompanyInfo.LocalCurrency}, {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Saldo '+{CompanyInfo.LocalCurrency}, {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Saldo '+{CompanyInfo.LocalCurrency}, True, 'Total '+{CompanyInfo.LocalCurrency} //Default English ) else switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Saldo '+{BusinessPartner.Currency}, {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Saldo '+{BusinessPartner.Currency}, {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Saldo '+{BusinessPartner.Currency}, {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Saldo '+{BusinessPartner.Currency}, {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Saldo '+{BusinessPartner.Currency}, {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Saldo '+{BusinessPartner.Currency}, {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Saldo '+{BusinessPartner.Currency}, True, 'Total '+{BusinessPartner.Currency} //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Betalings-information:', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Betalingsinformasjon:', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Zahlungsinformation:', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Información de pago', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Maksutiedot', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Betalingsgegevens', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Détails de paiement', True, 'Payment details:' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Samlet beløb over forfald:', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Saldo forfalt: ', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Gesamter Fälligkeitsbetrag', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Total pago vencido', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Yhteensä erääntyneet' , {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Totaal verschuldigde bedrag', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Montant total dû' , True, 'Total amount due:' //Default English )

switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Kontoudtog', {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Kontoutskrift', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Kontoauszug', {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Extracto de cuenta', {@X_Language} = 'FI', 'Saldoraportti', {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Saldo', {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Solde du compte', True, 'Account Balance' //Default English )
